sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-view />
</template>

<script>
import config from "./config";
import jwtDecode from "jwt-decode";

export default {
  // data(){
  //   return{
  //     title:'hello'
  //   }
  // }
  methods: {
    setAuth() {
      fetch(`${config.BASE_URL}/set-token`, {
        method: "POST",
        headers: {
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
        },
        body: null,
      })
        .then((response) => response.json())
        .then((response) => {
          console.log(response);
          this.$store.commit("setSession", {
            username: jwtDecode(response.token).username,
            token: response.token,
          });
        });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.setAuth()
  },
};
</script>

<style>
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

#app {
  background: linear-gradient(
    to bottom,
    #1c2034,
    #1c263b,
    #183248,
    #183a4c,
    #243a50,
    #2f354f,
    #20284c,
    #1b2146,
    #191b34
  );
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
